title: "Surreal Space Journey"
content:
Welcome to our website, where we take you on a journey through surreal space. Our abstract imagery of spaceships traveling through wormholes will transport you to another dimension. With bright colors and mesmerizing patterns, our wallpapers are designed to inspire creativity and imagination.

Whether you're looking to spruce up your desktop background or simply seeking inspiration for your next creative project, our collection of surreal space wallpapers is sure to captivate you. So sit back, relax, and let us take you on a journey through the cosmos.

Our wallpapers are available in various resolutions, so you can find the perfect fit for your device. We update our collection regularly, so be sure to check back often for new additions.

Join us on this surreal space journey and let your imagination run wild.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a spaceship traveling through a wormhole, with bright colors and surreal patterns."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
